library("grid")

## keybox


```{r}
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, disp, color=cyl, size=cyl)) + geom_point()

keybox(p, 'rect')
```

```{r}
keybox(p, 'roundrect', gp = gpar(col = '#808080', lty = "dashed"))
```
